entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add request duration to HostingEventSource #41073
  • Derived InputBase<T>, overridden methods not triggered #41072
  • Kestrel should throw BadHttpRequestException instead of InvalidOperationExceptions for absolute-form targets with non-ASCII characters #41071
    7.0-preview4
  • Blazor Http client doesn't timeout #41069
  • Blazor WASM: PostAsJsonAsync missing response header content-disposition #41068
  • BL0007: Component parameters should be auto property ignores .editoronfig on linux #41067
  • Bitdefender Total Security detects a Trojan when viewing published Blazor WebAssembly as well as while publishing too #41063
  • MapFallback catch all requests to API controller when ConsumeAttribute added #41060

Closed

  • Exception thrown in RequestDelegateFactory.Create when handling null as a default value for nullable struct type #40774
    7.0-preview4
  • In ASP.NET Core, why are Session and User not accessible from services instead of members of HttpContext? #41065
  • SymmetricSecurityKey used in JwtBearer TokenValidationParameters does not implement RFC2104 key padding #41024
  • Backport UseProgramMain template option to SDK 6.0.300 #40944
    6.0.x
  • Accessing hosted Blazor WebAssembly solution in Chrome Android browser resulted in error #41064
  • Make Result types constructors public #40802
    7.0-preview4
  • Dependency Injection woes. #41061
  • Debugging Blazor WASM after publish #41033
  • Blazor wasm: Cannot wait on monitors on this runtime, when calling odata in OnInitializedAsync #41046
  • Multiple instantiation of my app when hosted on IIS: on AppPool Start, On Website Start and on Website Stop #40822
  • GetUserAsync takes very long #40989

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Move CredScanSuppressions.json to root of repo (#39780)" #41070
    area-infrastructure
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

Merged

  • Fix for issue 40774 RequestDelegateFactory null param default #41025
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview4
  • Remove BuildX64 target #41040
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c9461a9` to `af29db7` #40999
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.17
  • Backport UseProgramMain template option #40945
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, ask-mode, 6.0.5
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `e2c62a7` to `930ccc7` #40466
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.34
  • Update branding to 2.1.34 #41055
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.34
  • [release/6.0] Add RID to targeting pack archive names #40731
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Uninstalling Hosting Bundle should uninstall chained runtimes #41057
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.5

Updated

  • Implement IProvideEndpointMetadata & IProvideEndpointParameterMetadata #40926
    area-runtime, api-approved
  • Introduce the Results<TResult1, TResult2, TResultN> union types #40986
    api-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Caching common HttpResults types #40965
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • feat (VSCode) : Add tasks to build current project #39221
    area-infrastructure, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add `AddStackExchangeRedisCache` & `AddHsts` overload #40689
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add trimming guidance for developers #40902
    area-infrastructure
  • Add/Modify Url Encoding/Decoding for IIS UrlRewrite #40483
    area-runtime, community-contribution
